member.name: N:System.Deployment.Application
member.summary: With the namespace, you can program custom upgrade behavior into your ClickOnce application.

member.name: T:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment
member.summary: Supports updates of the current deployment programmatically, as well as on-demand downloads of files. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: E:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when has completed.

member.name: E:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a progress update is available on a call.

member.name: E:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupCompleted
member.summary: Occurs on the main application thread once a file download completes.

member.name: E:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged
member.summary: Occurs when status information is available on a file download operation initiated by a call to .

member.name: E:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when ClickOnce has finished upgrading the application as the result of a call to .

member.name: E:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged
member.summary: Occurs when ClickOnce has new status information for an update operation initiated by calling .

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForDetailedUpdate
member.summary: Performs the same operation as , but returns extended information about the available update.
member.returns: An for the available update.
member.exception: The deployment manifest is corrupted. Regenerate the application's manifest before you attempt to deploy this application to users. This exception will appear in the property of the event.
The deployment manifest cannot be downloaded. This exception will appear in the property of the event.
The current application is either not configured to support updates, or there is another update check operation already in progress.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate
member.summary: Checks to determine whether a new update is available.
member.returns: true if a new update is available; otherwise, false.
member.exception: The deployment manifest is corrupted. You will likely need to redeploy the application to fix this problem. This exception will appear in the property of the event.
The deployment manifest cannot be downloaded. This exception will appear in the property of the event.
ClickOnce will throw this exception immediately if you call this method while an update is already in progress.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync
member.summary: Checks asynchronously to determine whether a new update is available.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsyncCancel
member.summary: Cancels the asynchronous update check.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads, on-demand, a set of optional files.
member.param: The named group of files to download. All files marked "optional" in a ClickOnce application require a group name.
member.exception: groupName parameter is null or zero-length.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads, on-demand, a set of optional files in the background.
member.param: The named group of files to download. All files marked "optional" in a ClickOnce application require a group name.
member.exception: groupName parameter is null or zero-length.
You cannot initiate more than one download of groupName at a time.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Downloads, on-demand, a set of optional files in the background, and passes a piece of application state to the event callbacks.
member.param: The named group of files to download. All files marked "optional" in a ClickOnce application require a group name.
An arbitrary object containing state information for the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: groupName parameter is null or zero-length.
You cannot initiate more than one download of groupName at a time.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsyncCancel(System.String)
member.summary: Cancel an asynchronous file download.
member.param: The named group of files to download. All files marked "optional" in a ClickOnce application require a group name.
member.exception: groupName cannot be null.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.IsFileGroupDownloaded(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the named file group has already been downloaded to the client computer.
member.returns: true if the file group has already been downloaded for the current version of this application; otherwise, false. If a new version of the application has been installed, and the new version has not added to, removed from, or altered files in the file group, will return true.
member.param: The named group of files to download. All files marked "optional" in a ClickOnce application require a group name.
member.exception: groupName is not a file group defined in the application manifest.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.Update
member.summary: Starts a synchronous download and installation of this application's latest version.
member.returns: true if an application has been updated; otherwise, false.
member.exception: The new deployment could not be downloaded from its location on the network.
Your ClickOnce deployment is corrupted. For tips on how to diagnose and correct the problem, see Troubleshooting ClickOnce Deployments.
The local computer did not grant this application the permission level it requested to execute.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync
member.summary: Starts an asynchronous download and installation of this application's latest version.
member.exception: The new deployment could not be downloaded from its location on the network.
Your ClickOnce deployment is corrupted. For tips on how to diagnose and correct the problem, see Troubleshooting ClickOnce Deployments.
The local computer did not grant this application the permission level it requested to execute.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsyncCancel
member.summary: Cancels an asynchronous update initiated by .

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentDeployment
member.summary: Returns the current for this deployment.
member.returns: The current deployment.
member.exception: You attempted to call this static property from a non- ClickOnce application.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the deployment for the current running instance of the application.
member.returns: The current deployment version.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.IsFirstRun
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is the first time this application has run on the client computer.
member.returns: true if this version of the application has never run on the client computer before; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.IsNetworkDeployed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current application is a ClickOnce application.
member.returns: true if this is a ClickOnce application; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.TimeOfLastUpdateCheck
member.summary: Gets the date of the time ClickOnce last checked for an application update.
member.returns: The of the last update check.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdatedApplicationFullName
member.summary: Gets the full name of the application after it has been updated.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdatedVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the update that was recently downloaded.
member.returns: The describing the version of the update.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation
member.summary: Gets the Web site or file share from which this application updates itself.
member.returns: The update path, expressed as an HTTP, HTTPS, or file URL; or as a Windows network file path (UNC).

member.name: T:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs
member.summary: Represents detailed update information obtained through a call to .

member.summary: Gets the version number of the latest uninstalled version.
member.returns: The expressing the major, minor, build and revision numbers of the latest version.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.IsUpdateRequired
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the update must be installed.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.MinimumRequiredVersion
member.summary: Gets the minimum version that the user must have installed on the computer.
member.returns: A object expressing the earliest version that all users must install.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.UpdateAvailable
member.summary: Gets whether an uninstalled update is available.
member.returns: true if new version of the application is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.UpdateSizeBytes
member.summary: Gets the size of the available update.
member.returns: An describing the size, in bytes, of the available update. If no update is available, returns 0.

member.summary: Gets the name of the file group being downloaded.

member.summary: Gets the action that the process is currently executing.
member.returns: A value, stating what element or elements the operation is currently downloading.
